c74object.name: sp.setupanalysis
c74object.digest: Analyze onsets for multiple descriptors at multiple timeframes
c74object.description: Analyze onsets for multiple descriptors at multiple timeframes.

discussion.p: The sp.setupanalysis object is used in conjunction with sp.onsetframe~ to create analyses for multiple descriptors at 256 and 4410 analysis windows. This is later used to improve matching with sp.corpusmatch.
